# Read.csv base do R
```{r}
start.time <- Sys.time()

read.csv("flights.zip")

end.time <- Sys.time()
time.taken <- end.time - start.time
time.taken
```

# Read_csv base do R

```{r}
library(readr)

start.time <- Sys.time()

read_csv("flights.zip")

end.time <- Sys.time()
time.taken <- end.time - start.time
time.taken

```


```{python}
import pandas as pd
import timeit

timeit.timeit('pd.read_csv("flights.zip")', number=10000, globals=globals())

```
